Column.Name: Procurement RecordID
Event Log
Parent Structure

Information.Text: TRUE is Opportunity ID doesn't match an existing Opportunity ID for another record on this EForm

Label.Text: Refresh responses (runs as 'pushed by') Be aware that the created responses are mostly empty. This is only used to get the 'count' correct

RaiseLinkedEForm.Description: Create Evaluation Record -- if no evaluation exists

Event.Name: Evaluation from Procurement Planning
Event.Description: Update an existing evaluation record that was created via Procurement Planning

TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula: HASH("Event", "Update Existing Evaluation Record Created via Procurement Planning")

FieldEntry.Formula: DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Evaluation", "[Status] = 'Not Started' AND [Sourcing ID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Evaluation Opportunity Id]) )

FieldEntry.ColumnName: Role is not a System User

ChangeFieldValues.Description: Update Procurement record with Evaluation details

LinkRecords.Description: Link the Evaluation to the Procurement

RaiseLinkedEForm.Description: API Request - Prepare an API request (if doc is stored on GTM)

TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula: HASH( "Request Source", ARRAY(EFormType, RecordID), "Opportunity ID", [Evaluation Opportunity Id], "Run as User", [Pushed by] )

Event.Name: Start Evaluation
Event.Description: A 'Start' event is posted from VendorPanel GTM

TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Evaluation from Procurement Planning (Procurement RecordID <> NULL, and existing evaluation status = Not Started)

FormulaCriterion.Formula: DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Evaluation", "[Status] = 'Not Started' AND [Sourcing ID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Evaluation Opportunity Id]) ) <> NULL

TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Uncancel Existing Evaluation (Existing cancelled evaluation which matching opportunity ID)

FormulaCriterion.Formula: AND( [Evaluation RecordID] <> NULL, DB_LOOKUP( "Status", "Evaluation", "[RecordID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Evaluation RecordID]) ) = "Cancelled" )

TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Create New Evaluation (No Existing Evaluation record)

FormulaCriterion.Formula: DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Evaluation", "[Sourcing ID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Evaluation Opportunity Id]) ) = NULL

Event.Name: Uncancel Existing Evaluation
Event.Description: When a start event is sent from GTM and there is an existing evaluation with matching opportunity id and status is cancelled
